title: Oil Beneficiary of Metal ETF Rally: Invesco
description: According to Invesco, resurgent investor demand for commodity exposure is supporting oil prices in a year when many anticipated a bearish supply glut. Kathy Kriskey, Head of Alternatives ETF Strategy at Invesco, joins "ETF IQ" to discuss.  (Source: Bloomberg)
content: According to Invesco, resurgent investor demand for commodity exposure is supporting oil prices in a year when many anticipated a bearish supply glut. Kathy Kriskey, Head of Alternatives ETF Strategy at Invesco, joins "ETF IQ" to discuss.  (Source: Bloomberg)
